topicSummary: Chronic suppurative otitis media (CSOM) is a chronic inflammation of the middle ear and mastoid cavity

topicHtmlObjects.htmlHeader: Otitis media - chronic suppurative: Summary

latestChanges.title: Reviewed and updated
latestChanges.body: A literature search was conducted in July 2017 to identify evidence-based guidelines, UK policy, systematic reviews, and key randomized controlled trials published since the last revision of this topic. The topic has undergone restructuring. No major changes to the recommendations have been made.
